contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox school | name = Queen's High School | seal_image = | motto = "Through Love of Learning, We Learn to Live." | type = Girls' Secondary | established = 1955 | address = 195 Surrey Street,<br>St Clair,<br>Dunedin | coordinates = {{coord|45.903551|S|170.492071|E|type:edu_region:NZ-OTA|display=inline,title}} | principal = Julie Anderson | roll = 603 | decile = 5<ref>[http://www.minedu.govt.nz/web/downloadable/dl7698_v1/decile-changes-2007-2008-web-state-s-integ.xls Decile change 2007 to 2008 for state & state integrated schools]</ref> | MOE = 384 | homepage = [http://www.queens.school.nz/ queens.school.nz] }} '''Queen's High School''' is a state single-sex girls' secondary school in [[Dunedin, New Zealand|Dunedin]]. It is located at the southern end of the city close to the boundary between the suburbs of [[Saint Clair, New Zealand|St. Clair and Forbury]], next to the parallel single-sex boys' school, [[King's High School, Dunedin|King's]], with which it shares some facilities. ==Notes== {{reflist}} [[Category:Secondary schools in Dunedin]] [[Category:Girls' schools in New Zealand]] {{NZ-school-stub}}
